option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.*?> <?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.scene.image.*?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<BorderPane fx:id="rootPane" prefHeight="600" prefWidth="800" maxHeight="600" maxWidth="800" minHeight="600" minWidth="800" styleClass="dashboard-root" stylesheets="@../css/dashboard.css,@../css/manage_schedule.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17.0.12" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.momentum.dosein.controller.ManageScheduleController">
<!-- LEFT NAVIGATION --> <left> <VBox styleClass="nav-bar" spacing="15" prefWidth="200" minWidth="200" maxWidth="200"> <padding> <Insets top="20" right="15" bottom="20" left="15"/> </padding>
<!-- Logo and App Name --> <HBox fx:id="navHeader" styleClass="nav-header" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="12" prefHeight="70"> <HBox styleClass="logo-container" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="12"> <ImageView fitWidth="30" fitHeight="30" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/logo.png"/> </ImageView> <Label text="Doseln" styleClass="nav-logo"/> </HBox> </HBox>
<!-- Navigation Menu --> <VBox spacing="8" styleClass="nav-menu-container"> <Button text="Dashboard" onAction="#handleDashboard" styleClass="nav-item"> <graphic> <ImageView fitWidth="18" fitHeight="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/dashboard-icon.png"/> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button text="Manage Schedule" onAction="#handleManageSchedule" styleClass="nav-button-active"> <graphic> <ImageView fitWidth="18" fitHeight="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/calendar-icon.png"/> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button text="Doctor Contacts" onAction="#handleDoctorContacts" styleClass="nav-item-contacts"> <graphic> <ImageView fitWidth="18" fitHeight="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/doctor-icon.png"/> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button text="Emergency" onAction="#handleEmergency" styleClass="nav-item"> <graphic> <ImageView fitWidth="18" fitHeight="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/emergency-icon.png"/> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button text="About Us" onAction="#handleAboutUs" styleClass="nav-item"> <graphic> <ImageView fitWidth="18" fitHeight="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/about-icon.png"/> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox>
<Region VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS"/>
<VBox styleClass="signout-container"> <Button text="Sign Out" onAction="#handleSignOut" styleClass="nav-signout"> <graphic> <ImageView fitWidth="18" fitHeight="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/signout-icon.png"/> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox> </VBox> </left>
<!-- CENTER CONTENT --> <center> <VBox styleClass="main-content" spacing="25"> <padding> <Insets top="40" right="40" bottom="40" left="40"/> </padding>
<!-- Header Card --> <VBox spacing="0" styleClass="welcome-card"> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" prefWidth="578.0" spacing="20" styleClass="welcome-banner"> <padding> <Insets bottom="25" left="25" right="50" top="25" /> </padding>
<VBox spacing="0"> <Label styleClass="greeting-text" text="Manage Schedule" /> <Label styleClass="slogan-text" text="Stay on track with your Medication" /> </VBox>
<Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" /> </HBox> </VBox>
<!-- Main Content Card --> <VBox spacing="0" styleClass="schedule-card"> <padding> <Insets bottom="15" left="15" right="15" top="15" /> </padding>
<Label style="-fx-padding: 0 0 0 10" styleClass="section-title" text="Active Alerts" /> <HBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" prefHeight="300.0" prefWidth="530.0" spacing="20"> <!-- Active Alerts Section --> <VBox styleClass="active-alerts-container" alignment="TOP_CENTER"> <ScrollPane fitToWidth="true" hbarPolicy="NEVER" vbarPolicy="AS_NEEDED" styleClass="medicine-scroll"> <content> <VBox fx:id="medicineButtonsContainer" styleClass="medicine-buttons-container" alignment="TOP_CENTER"> <!-- Medicine buttons will be added dynamically --> </VBox> </content> </ScrollPane>
<!-- Empty State Label --> <Label fx:id="emptyStateLabel" styleClass="empty-state-label" text="No reminders set yet.\nGo to Set Reminder to add medicines." visible="false" wrapText="true" /> </VBox>
<!-- Medicine Information Panel --> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" maxWidth="270.0" minWidth="270.0" prefWidth="270.0" spacing="10" styleClass="medicine-info-container"> <!-- Medicine Information Label --> <Label styleClass="section-title" text="Medicine Information" />
<!-- Medicine Information Details --> <VBox spacing="12" styleClass="medicine-info-grid"> <!-- Name --> <HBox spacing="10"> <Label prefWidth="80" styleClass="info-label" text="Name :" /> <Label fx:id="nameLabel" styleClass="info-value" text="No medicine selected" wrapText="true" /> </HBox>
<!-- Start Date --> <HBox spacing="10"> <Label prefWidth="80" styleClass="info-label" text="Start Date :" /> <Label fx:id="startDateLabel" styleClass="info-value" text="-" /> </HBox>
<!-- End Date --> <HBox spacing="10"> <Label prefWidth="80" styleClass="info-label" text="End Date :" /> <Label fx:id="endDateLabel" styleClass="info-value" text="-" /> </HBox>
<!-- Additional Information --> <VBox spacing="5"> <Label styleClass="info-label" text="Additional Information :" /> <Label fx:id="noteLabel" styleClass="info-value" text="Select a medicine from the list" wrapText="true" /> </VBox>
<!-- Alert Time --> <VBox spacing="5"> <Label styleClass="info-label" text="Alert Time:" /> </VBox> </VBox>
<!-- Alert Time Scroll Pane --> <VBox styleClass="alert-times-section"> <ScrollPane fitToHeight="true" hbarPolicy="AS_NEEDED" vbarPolicy="NEVER" styleClass="time-scroll-pane"> <content> <HBox fx:id="timesBox" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="8" styleClass="time-pills-container" /> </content> </ScrollPane> </VBox>
<!-- Delete Button --> <HBox alignment="CENTER_RIGHT" styleClass="delete-container"> <Button onAction="#handleDelete" prefHeight="35" prefWidth="120" styleClass="delete-button" text="Delete"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="16" fitWidth="16" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/delete-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </HBox> </VBox> </HBox> </VBox> </VBox> </center> </BorderPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.*?> <?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.scene.image.*?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<BorderPane fx:id="rootPane" prefHeight="600" prefWidth="800" maxHeight="600" maxWidth="800" minHeight="600" minWidth="800" styleClass="dashboard-root" stylesheets="@../css/dashboard.css,@../css/manage_schedule.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17.0.12" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.momentum.dosein.controller.ManageScheduleController">
<!-- LEFT NAVIGATION --> <left> <VBox styleClass="nav-bar" spacing="15" prefWidth="200" minWidth="200" maxWidth="200"> <padding> <Insets top="20" right="15" bottom="20" left="15"/> </padding>
<!-- Logo and App Name --> <HBox fx:id="navHeader" styleClass="nav-header" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="12" prefHeight="70"> <HBox styleClass="logo-container" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="12"> <ImageView fitWidth="30" fitHeight="30" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/logo.png"/> </ImageView> <Label text="Doseln" styleClass="nav-logo"/> </HBox> </HBox>
<!-- Navigation Menu --> <VBox spacing="8" styleClass="nav-menu-container"> <Button text="Dashboard" onAction="#handleDashboard" styleClass="nav-item"> <graphic> <ImageView fitWidth="18" fitHeight="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/dashboard-icon.png"/> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button text="Manage Schedule" onAction="#handleManageSchedule" styleClass="nav-button-active"> <graphic> <ImageView fitWidth="18" fitHeight="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/calendar-icon.png"/> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button text="Doctor Contacts" onAction="#handleDoctorContacts" styleClass="nav-item-contacts"> <graphic> <ImageView fitWidth="18" fitHeight="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/doctor-icon.png"/> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button text="Emergency" onAction="#handleEmergency" styleClass="nav-item"> <graphic> <ImageView fitWidth="18" fitHeight="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/emergency-icon.png"/> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button text="About Us" onAction="#handleAboutUs" styleClass="nav-item"> <graphic> <ImageView fitWidth="18" fitHeight="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/about-icon.png"/> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox>
<Region VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS"/>
<VBox styleClass="signout-container"> <Button text="Sign Out" onAction="#handleSignOut" styleClass="nav-signout"> <graphic> <ImageView fitWidth="18" fitHeight="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/signout-icon.png"/> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox> </VBox> </left>
<!-- CENTER CONTENT --> <center> <VBox styleClass="main-content" spacing="25"> <padding> <Insets top="40" right="40" bottom="40" left="40"/> </padding>
<!-- Header Card --> <VBox spacing="0" styleClass="welcome-card"> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" prefWidth="578.0" spacing="20" styleClass="welcome-banner"> <padding> <Insets bottom="25" left="25" right="50" top="25" /> </padding>
<VBox spacing="0"> <Label styleClass="greeting-text" text="Manage Schedule" /> <Label styleClass="slogan-text" text="Stay on track with your Medication" /> </VBox>
<Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" /> </HBox> </VBox>
<!-- Main Content Card --> <VBox spacing="0" styleClass="schedule-card" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS"> <padding> <Insets bottom="15" left="15" right="15" top="15" /> </padding>
<Label style="-fx-padding: 0 0 0 10" styleClass="section-title" text="Active Alerts" /> <HBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" prefHeight="300.0" prefWidth="530.0" spacing="20"> <!-- Active Alerts Section --> <VBox styleClass="active-alerts-container" alignment="TOP_CENTER"> <ScrollPane fitToWidth="true" hbarPolicy="NEVER" vbarPolicy="AS_NEEDED" styleClass="medicine-scroll"> <content> <VBox fx:id="medicineButtonsContainer" styleClass="medicine-buttons-container" alignment="TOP_CENTER"> <!-- Medicine buttons will be added dynamically --> </VBox> </content> </ScrollPane>
<!-- Empty State Label --> <Label fx:id="emptyStateLabel" styleClass="empty-state-label" text="No reminders set yet.\nGo to Set Reminder to add medicines." visible="false" wrapText="true" /> </VBox>
<!-- Medicine Information Panel --> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" maxWidth="270.0" minWidth="270.0" prefWidth="270.0" spacing="10" styleClass="medicine-info-container"> <!-- Medicine Information Label --> <Label styleClass="section-title" text="Medicine Information" />
<!-- Medicine Information Details --> <VBox spacing="12" styleClass="medicine-info-grid"> <!-- Name --> <HBox spacing="10"> <Label prefWidth="80" styleClass="info-label" text="Name :" /> <Label fx:id="nameLabel" styleClass="info-value" text="No medicine selected" wrapText="true" /> </HBox>
<!-- Start Date --> <HBox spacing="10"> <Label prefWidth="80" styleClass="info-label" text="Start Date :" /> <Label fx:id="startDateLabel" styleClass="info-value" text="-" /> </HBox>
<!-- End Date --> <HBox spacing="10"> <Label prefWidth="80" styleClass="info-label" text="End Date :" /> <Label fx:id="endDateLabel" styleClass="info-value" text="-" /> </HBox>
<!-- Additional Information --> <VBox spacing="5"> <Label styleClass="info-label" text="Additional Information :" /> <Label fx:id="noteLabel" styleClass="info-value" text="Select a medicine from the list" wrapText="true" /> </VBox>
<!-- Alert Time --> <VBox spacing="5"> <Label styleClass="info-label" text="Alert Time:" /> </VBox> </VBox>
<!-- Alert Time Scroll Pane --> <VBox styleClass="alert-times-section"> <ScrollPane fitToHeight="true" hbarPolicy="AS_NEEDED" vbarPolicy="NEVER" styleClass="time-scroll-pane"> <content> <HBox fx:id="timesBox" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="8" styleClass="time-pills-container" /> </content> </ScrollPane> </VBox>
<!-- Delete Button --> <HBox alignment="CENTER_RIGHT" styleClass="delete-container"> <Button onAction="#handleDelete" prefHeight="35" prefWidth="120" styleClass="delete-button" text="Delete"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="16" fitWidth="16" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/delete-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </HBox> </VBox> </HBox> </VBox> </VBox> </center> </BorderPane>
